functions.name: get
functions.signature: ($map as object(), $key as string) as item()
functions.description: Returns the value under the key.
functions.summary: Returns the value under the key.

returns.description: the value under the $key, () if empty Example:

functions.name: has-key
functions.signature: ($map as object(), $key as string) as boolean
functions.description: Returns true if $key exists in the map.
functions.summary: Returns true if $key exists in the map.

returns.description: true if $key exists, false otherwise Example:

functions.name: set-if-empty
functions.signature: ($map as object(), $key as xs:string, $value as item()) as boolean
functions.description:
Only if key doesn't exist, inserts new key and value into the map and
 returns true. Otherwise returns false.
functions.summary: Only if key doesn't exist, inserts new key and value into the map and returns true.

returns.description: true if $key is empty, false otherwise Example:

functions.name: set
functions.signature: ($map as object(), $key as xs:string, $value as item()) as boolean
functions.description:
Inserts new key and value into the map or replaces value under the exiting key.
 Returns true all the time.
functions.summary: Inserts new key and value into the map or replaces value under the exiting key.
